//UserInput.js import React, {useState} from 'react'; const UserInput = () =>{ const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company:'', position:'', date:'', location:'', url:'' }); const handleClear = () => { //Remove all the text from the umput fields setFormData({ company:'', position:'', date:'', location:'', url:'' }); }; const handleSubmit = () => { return Hello }; return(
setFormData({...formData, company:e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, position:e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, date:e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, location:e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, url:e.target.value})} />
); }; export default UserInput;
